Name: Western Digital My Cloud's snmp_mgr.cgi file multiple parameter command execution
Description: Western Digital MyCloud is a personal cloud storage device that connects the storage device to the existing network to provide data and file services. Several parameters of the snmp_mgr.cgi file of Western Digital My Cloud have command execution interruption, and the attacker can obtain the administrator rights of the device and compromise the device.
Author: mahui@gobies.org
Impact:
Western Digital MyCloud是个人云存储设备，将存储设备连接到现有的网络上来提供数据和文件服务。

Western Digital My Cloud的snmp_mgr.cgi文件多个参数存在命令执行漏洞，该漏洞源于设备的snmp_mgr.cgi文件没有对传输的值进行过滤检查，导致攻击者直接给参数传入攻击载荷即可获取设备的root shell，进而攻陷设备。
Recommandation:
1、官方已修复该漏洞，请用户进入web管理页面进行固件更新。（操作有风险，注意备份）

2、通过防火墙等安全设备设置访问策略，设置白名单访问。

3、如非必要，禁止公网访问该系统。
